SummaryEnglish: Did you know that a lot of your favorite anime are based in real-life locations? Join us on a pilgrimage around Japan to the "Sanctuaries" that are the inspiration of some of the greatest anime!

1.SummaryEnglish: "Anime Sanctuaries" is a show that takes you to the real-life locations behind your favorite anime. Episode one features the long-running series "Love Live!" and its setting - Akihabara in Tokyo.

2.SummaryEnglish: "Wolf Children" has one of the most devoted cult followings in Anime, with fans from around the globe. We check out its setting - Toyama Prefecture - and learn more about its fascinating history.
